title: New: Bedroom – In My Head
body:
There has yet to truly be a truly out-of-the-bedroom (excuse the pun) popstar.

In other words, an artist who has grown from recording through the mic on their macbook to performing the same songs to 2,000 people a night. Now I’m not saying **Bedroom** aka **Noah Kittinger** is necessarily going to be the act to do it, however it’s surely going to happen sooner rather than later, and if the Nashville based teenager keeps putting out tracks of this quality then there’s no reason why he can’t be in the mix. _In My Head_, his first official release since his album _**Vivid**_ mid-way through last year, shows a progression and maturity to his sound, considering the atmosphere and relationships between his own vocals and that of the instrumentation.
